lead_paragraph: Cleveland Cavaliers guard J.R. Smith showed off a pretty good shot Wednesday — not on the court, but on the practice range at Firestone Country Club.

headline.print_headline: JR Smith Sees US Open Champion and Takes a Drive
headline.main: JR Smith Sees US Open Champion and Takes a Drive

snippet: Cleveland Cavaliers guard J.R. Smith showed off a pretty good shot Wednesday — not on the court, but on the practice range at Firestone Country Club....
